name: Tomato-Burrata Salad With Olives, Lemon Zest, and Basil
description: A dynamite duo of ripe, juicy tomatoes and creamy burrata cheese joins briny kalamata olives, aromatic lemon zest, and ribbons of fresh basil, all garnished with quality olive oil, a splash of red wine vinegar, and a finishing sprinkle of fresh-cracked pepper and flaky sea salt.
recipeIngredient: 2 ripe medium tomatoes, cut into wedges
1/4 cup pitted and sliced Kalamata olives
1/4 cup loosely packed fresh basil leaves, cut into ribbons

recipeInstructions.text: Carefully slice burrata cheese balls in half and arrange on plates with tomatoes and olives. Garnish with lemon zest and basil. Drizzle with olive oil and vinegar. Finish each plate with a few turns of cracked black pepper and a sprinkle of flaky sea salt. Serve immediately.
